title: infiniteharvest
author: infiniteharvest
content: Each year, the list of reliable and secure crypto exchanges that operate without requiring KYC (Know your Customer) info diminishes. This decline is driven by increased governmental scrutiny of the crypto industry worldwide. However, numerous investors continue to prioritize their privacy and seek the ability to conduct transactions without divulging their personal information.Here's a detailed list of instant swap exchanges that you can use today without any ID verification.Full list: https://medium.com/@cryptochrispf/best-no-kyc-and-instant-swap-crypto-exchanges-in-2023-d37e25597aa5

The site enables you to filter your search to select platforms that do not require KYC.

comments.author: OcTradism
comments.body: I don't like swap between coins because conversion fee is usually more expensive than trading .kycnot.me is well known as a good website for information, review about non-KYC exchanges and many of them have swap feature too. However, the website is slowly with information update recent months. comments.body: Even with the swaps, there will be point of time that they will ask info and kyc from their anonymous customers.
